heading: Monday Night
text: Clear, with some high clouds late in the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley. Lows from zero to 10 below, some teens below northeast and in the Adirondacks. Light winds, becoming southwest 5 to 10 mph in the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley.

heading: Tuesday
text: Mostly to partly sunny. Highs mainly in the upper teens to lower 20s, with some mid teens northeast, and some mid 20s in the St. Lawrence Valley. Winds becoming south 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Cloudy. Scattered, light snow showers. Lows in the teens east of the Greens, rising into the low to mid 20s west. South to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph, except gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain Valley.
